title: Single Target Clicking
description: Automate clicks on a single spot with customizable click intervals as low as 1 millisecond. Ideal for precision tasks.

title: Multi Target Clicking
description: Click on multiple targets with ease. Supports up to 1 millisecond clicking intervals and allows unlimited target selection for diverse automation tasks.

title: Auto Form Fill Up
description: Automatically fill forms with pre-saved information, simplifying repetitive data entry tasks

title: Auto Scroll
description: Automate scrolling for Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, TikTok, and Facebook. Includes customizable scroll intervals and directional control (up or down).

title: Auto Refresh
description: Refresh apps, web pages, or software automatically. Includes options for user-defined refresh intervals.

title: Auto Swipe
description: Automate left or right swipes with user-defined swipe intervals. Suitable for apps, browsers, and software.

title: Touch & Hold
description: Automate touch and hold gestures for long-press actions with customizable hold duration.

title: Capture Screenshot/Reord
description: Easily capture screenshots (full page, selected area, or current screen) and record videos in formats like MP4, WEBM, and MKV with resolutions from 480p to 4K.

title: Macro Recorder
description: Record and replay complex sequences of mouse clicks, keystrokes, and wait commands. Supports both auto and manual recording modes.

title: Auto Zoom
description: Automate zooming actions for apps, browsers, or software. Supports customizable zoom intervals for precise control.

title: Auto Hotkey
description: Leverage predefined scripts for automation. Beginner-friendly with no programming skills required.
